name: Tomino the Damned
nutshell: Maruo's newest work, a story of twins being forced to join a travelling freak show.

name: Houkago no! Iruma-kun
nutshell:
An official Mairimashita! Iruma-kun anthology series, featuring stories of Iruma Suzuki and friends's adventures as students of Babyls Demon School.
Chapter numbering is in order of release.

TABLE OF CONTENTS (VOLUME 1):
CHAPTER 1 - Iruma-sama Caught On Camera!
Mangaka:  Hachi (The Witch's Bloody Paintings)
Eiko and Asmodeus meet in private to share with each other some photos that they've secretly taken of Iruma.
CHAPTER 2 - I Just Haven't Given It My Best Yet
Mangaka: Saori Muronaga (All Alone in Hyakki Demon Village)
Opera laments their inability to get a good photo of Iruma, so they decide to train with Iruma in order to do so.
CHAPTER 3 - Detective Iruma Case File: The Missing Fluff
Mangaka: Nango Kouta (Kojirase Hyakki Dominor)
After playing a mystery game, Iruma and Lied get bitten by the detective bug. But when Elizabetta discovers that her tail scrunchie is missing, can Iruma Holmes and Lied Watson figure out the culprit?
CHAPTER 4 - As Expected From Kirio-senpai!
Mangaka: Shinobi (Yandere Kanojo)
A day in the life of Kirio, Iruma’s senpai who secretly has an obsession with seeing people in despair.
CHAPTER 5 - I Can't Wake Up! Iruma-kun
Mangaka: Rio (Despair Boy and China Girl)
Asmodeus and Clara come across Iruma sleeping, and compete against each other to see who will wake him up first.
CHAPTER 6 - Clara’s Seduction Challenge
Mangaka: Sako Misaki (Doki Doki Yokai Love Battle! ~ Great Yokai War!)
When Clara’s succubus mentor teaches her about enchanted chocolate that will make the consumer fall in love with its creator, Clara naturally tries to see if she can make chocolate that will make Iruma act lovey-dovey towards her.
CHAPTER 7 - Azz-kun's Devilum
Mangaka: Shimotsuki Seira  (Sewaga Yakemasu Hades-sama)
Iruma and Clara ask Asmodeus what he normally does during Devilum balls.
CHAPTER 8 - Once Again... Please, Opera-san!
Mangaka: Nagi Mayuko (My Student Won't Go Back Home)
Amelie asks Opera to help her improve her cooking skills.
CHAPTER 9 - That's a Mythical Creature, Iruma-kun!
Mangaka: Yoshimatsumetsu  (Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita artist)
Iruma’s class discusses their efforts as children to find the delicacy known as humans - while the human Iruma tries to change the subject.
CHAPTER 10 - Evade Them All! Iruma-kun!
Mangaka: Kakemaru Kakeru (Shonen Racquet)
Clara decides to put Iruma’s danger avoidance skills to the test with a massive gauntlet of traps.
CHAPTER 12 - The Irumi in Our Hearts
Mangaka: Fukui Takumi (Shuumatsu no Valkyrie writer)
Iruma’s classmates discuss the mysterious new idol Irumi who suddenly appeared at a concert beforehand.
CHAPTER 13 - Amelie's Heart-Pounding Grand Campaign
Mangaka: Sakurai Norio (Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu)
After reading shoujo manga, Amelie seeks to replicate romantic moments from them with Iruma.
CHAPTER 14 - Iruma-kun and the Cherry Blossom Viewing Party
Mangaka: Itagaki Paru (BEASTARS)
Iruma, Asmodeus, and Clara set up a cherry blossom viewing party.
CHAPTER 15 - ???
Mangaka: Heriyama (Governess Nazuna-san)

TABLE OF CONTENTS (VOLUME 2):
CHAPTER 11 - Break them Bones! Bablys Staff
Mangaka: Kawasaki Chuu (Shuumatsu Busou Pancake writer)
The Babyls teachers participate in an arm-breaking (arm-wrestling) contest.
CHAPTER 16 - ???
Mangaka: Abekawa Kineko (Touken Ranbu Anthology ~ Preparations For Departure!)
CHAPTER 17 - ???
Mangaka: Kobayashi Moriwo (Melancholy Melancholic Melancholinist)
CHAPTER 18 - ???
Mangaka: Suzuki Iko (One Step!)
CHAPTER 19 - ???
Mangaka: Kuze Mizuki (Shuumatsu Friends)
CHAPTER 20 - ???
Mangaka: Utagawa Utako (Jitsuwa: Fukakaidan Kissa)
CHAPTER 21 - ???
Mangaka: Tatsubon (Tadokoro-san)
Chapter 22 - ???
Mangaka: Saito Michi (The Rising Of The Vibrator Hero)
Chapter 23 - ???
Mangaka: Tachibana Mizuki (Seishun Radio Pinchers)
Chapter 24 - ???
Mangaka: FUKASAWA Neji (He is popular, but he is not good at love)
Chapter 25 - ???
Mangaka: Takewakamaru (Gurenki - Creo the Crimson Crises)
Chapter 26 - ???
Mangaka: Fujino Pochomukin (Kayou Koukyuu no Hanayome)

name: Anata wa Kawai Hito ~Datsuryoku-kei An'nyui Joshi, Shuuchaku Wanko ni Torotoro ni Aisareru~
Suki Kirai Suki
nutshell: Inoue Azusa's classmate, Saito, is extremely good looking, but he has the worst personality ever. For some reason, he started noticing Azusa and gets her in a lot of trouble. Although he's very annoying, Azusa gradually becomes attracted to him. However, Azusa's classmate, Kou, is not only handsome and is the president, but towards Azusa he is…?!

name: Kaze Hikaru: Koushien
nutshell: Tamagawa high school's baseball team lost all matches in the first round for years. Yutaka is a tiny boy who joined the team as reserve player and he is good at mimicking. The new coach soon spotted his ability and placed him on an important position - the pitcher. The two slowly help the team to build up their strength and spirit.

name: 0 kara Hajimeru Manga Kyoushitsu
nutshell:
Reika is a rich girl who wants to pursue her dream of being a mangaka; and so, she hired a butler, one whom specializes in teaching people how to draw manga. That is how Seba* came here.
However, since his knowledge about manga is vast, he turns into the ultimate Spartan whenever he teaches her! Even today, he whips her still.
The secret teaching debut, and the enthusiasm over cool butlers will start soon!
It's a how-to-draw-manga thing KURUMATANI Haruko posts on Sho-Comi. There's about 2-3 pages of it each issue. It's not really a story or anything, it just talks about how to draw manga and techniques, etc.

name: Duke's Servant
nutshell: Lindsay is a top-secret spy about to take on her most difficult mission yet: to disguise herself as a man?! Her target is the Duke. Rich, mysterious, and… an infamous womanizer. Cutting her hair, drinking elixirs to hide her voice, as a servant she must infiltrate his manor and investigate the mysterious disappearance of lords and ladies in the area. However, when she meets the Duke for the first time and he kisses her, is it her identity that's compromised or her heart…

name: Kimi to Watashii no Taiiku no Jikan
nutshell:
"Even though he should be an impertinent, irritating and hateful junior…"
An encounter with an impolite and rude junior in a P.E. class full of boys!??

name: Raiatea
nutshell: Suddenly stricken with lupus, a photographer loses sight in one eye. Faced with an uncertain prognosis, he feels an urgent need to revisit the South Pacific island that inspired his career. Can he convince the man he encountered there years ago, now a medical researcher in Southern California, to accompany him on his journey?

name: Pokemon Battle Stories
nutshell: A story about a newspaper reporter, "Wakaba," who travels around the region to report on events related to Pokemon.

name: BUILDER
nutshell: In the near future, humans have created technology to allow them to dream whatever they desire. Those who seek to become gods in this dream world are called "Builders". A girl uses this technology for the first time for the same purpose. Why does she want to become a Builder?!

name: Mutant Sabu
nutshell:
The loneliness and sadness of a boy, Sabu, who has awakened to paranormal abilities.... In prehistoric times, humans had the mental sensitivity to speak with their hearts and minds instead of words. Following the development of language ability, the ability that should have degenerated is revived!? A transfusion of blood from a girl awakens the psychic powers of a boy, Mutant Sabu, and he is born! The short story series about a hero with unusual abilities, which is considered one of Ishinomori's best-known  supernatural SF works and won the 1966 Kodansha Children's Manga Award along with "Cyborg 009," is now ready to begin!


As mentioned in the description, Mutant Sabu Won the 7th Kodansha Children's Manga Award in 1966, which it shared with Ishinomori's other, very famous, work Cyborg 009

name: Ru~mu! Room No.1301
nutshell:
From Operation Boredom:
High school Student Kinugawa Kenichi is one of the members of the class committee and also the boyfriend of the super cute Ooumi Chiyako. However, one day, a new student, Kuwabatake Aya, transfers to their school, and demands that Kenichi be her boyfriend…?! Who exactly is this girl, and how does she know Kenichi?

name: Sorairo Kaigan
nutshell: Sakurai Tomo is a highschool girl who lives in a town close to a beach. One day as she was getting molested on the bus, she gets rescued by a classmate(?!). However, the key holder dropped by her rescuer held the same Agate that she has gotten from a boy in her past?! Is he the same person?!

name: A Swallow Falling Into the Sea
nutshell:
Collection of mysterious stories by Chie Shinohara, a great artist of suspense manga.
Story 01 Part 01 & 02: Umi ni Ochiru Tsubame - Swallow Falling into the Sea
Masako Minase, a scriptwriter, was murdered by Shiki Morimura, her rival in the same profession. Shiki was sure that she had destroyed evidence completely. However, someone who knew the truth appeared, and tried to get Shiki in his power. Is it a mysterious spot or unhappy desire that lurks in her mind?
Story 02: Kioku no Ashioto - The Footsteps of Memory)
This is the story about Shouko and the almost tragic moment that changed her life and emotions …
Story 03: Shikeidai no 72-jikan - 72 hours of death stand
Five young people receives a letter saying that they murdered someone and they must go to the address in the letter if they don't want other people to found out. They all find themselves in a old European house, where a crazy lady tells them that one of them is a murderer and if that murderer don't confess in 72 hours, they will all die.

name: Seijou Kouchakan no Jijou
nutshell:
Shino asks his best friend Akira to help set him up with Maruyama, the girl of his dreams. Unfortunately, Akira ends up taking her for himself.
Depressed, Shino heads down to a black tea shop run by a guy named Shuuji to drown his sorrow by pigging out on cakes. Sometime in the past, Shuuji had a spat with a friend or something (referred to only as “that guy”) who thinks the best way to make up is send mysterious unmarked packages of randomly selected tea. I guess he has a history of sending dangerous gifts, as Shuuji gives Shino the tea “on the house” to see if it’s poisoned. Well, the tea appears to have been laced with a genie, who promptly grants Shino his desire to be with Maruyama… But be careful of what you wish for…

name: House of Dolls
nutshell: The mysterious woman, and those who are controlled by her. Don’t be fooled by the devilish hidden grin! The legendary hit author, Lee Jongkyu and the god artist Rigeng’s full length webtoon.

name: Maria
nutshell: Maria is a girl attending a Christian private school. Her mother is sick and in the hospital, her family poor. They live off the money of a man whose identity is unknown to Maria. He is called “Daddy Long-Legs” and he supports Maria and her mother with only one fee: Maria becoming his bride. Just who is this mysterious man? Is it the doctor? Someone she does not know? A boy from school…?

name: Spirit of the Ocean
nutshell: This fantastic story takes place in the incredible Ming Dynasty of Imperial China. Ning Haier is a reckless pirate girl whose father is the leader of Ning Citadel – the most powerful pirate den of the Southern Sea. One day, Haier led a band of pirates and looted a Spanish ambassador ship while her father was away. There she met a very handsome English man named Michael, who was a very talented translator and an extremely intelligent merchant on the ship. Marveled by Haier's beauty and character, Michael attempts to win over Haier's heart but failed! However, opportunity arose when Haier was captured by the new governor named Shao Zhixun, who vowed to annihilate piracy from China's seas forever. Michael was able to convince Shao Zhixun that Haier is just an innocent maiden who was impressed into piracy… and Shao Zhixun arranged a position for Haier in his own household! Even more interesting, Haier's father captured Michael and planned to collaborate with the charismatic and capable young man, and offered Haier as Michael's bride!

name: Koi Neko
nutshell: Shinta likes to play with cats even though he cannot have one for a pet because of his father's allergies. Cats also like to play with Shinta… in more ways than one… including becoming Shinta's girlfriend and generally trying to get him to reciprocate their catcalls, literally.

name: Kokou no Bocchi Reijou wa Hatsukoi Ouji ni Furaretai
nutshell:
"I-I'll lift your curse."
The lonely young lady Lurie was suddenly brought the news of her engagement to the Crown Prince! The ladies who were his highness' fiancée candidates were cursed one after another, so Lurie was offered a contract engagement as a counter measure counter, but... For Lurie, who longs for him and lives a secret life, his existence is too dazzling-?! A romantic comedy about the engagement of a cursed crown prince and a monster-user young lady!

name: Shin Hyataro of the Ushiro
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
"Hyataro of the Ushiro " returns with a sequel!
Junior high school student Ichitaro Ushiro is involved in a series of mysterious phenomena as if guided by his guardian spirit, Hyataro.
This time, he is guided by a mysterious girl, Miu Fuka, to visit the "Parapsychology Research Institute", which researches spirits, and is again involved in mysterious phenomena....
Ichitaro, Hyataro, and their dog, Zero, a psychic dog. The three of them must work together to unravel the mysterious phenomenon!

name: Boukenka ni Narou! Skill Board de Dungeon Kouryaku
nutshell:
Karaboshi Haruki has no presence as far as can be recognized, and so he became an adventurer with only the desire to "stand out." One day, a dungeon appeared under his home in Hokkaido. Coincidentally, he picked up a "Skill Board" with which he can spend skill points to increase his growth rate. Is it possible to become a popular person by obsessively diving into your home dungeon everyday?
Based on the popular fantasy Light Novel: "Become an Adventurer," winner of the 6th Net Novel Grand Prize.

name: Kaikan Douki
nutshell: Niwa Tasuku working at Sanden Printing Company for 2 years now but still can't get along at all with with Yukino Tsumugi, a female colleague at the DTP department. Their colleagues try to 'break the ice' by inviting them out for drinks but later that night, they ended up in a love hotel. A strange "connection" is made between these two, one that would 'link' them during the most private thoughts and moments!

name: Ichinose-kun wa Itsumo Iinari.
nutshell:
The Ichinose family has served to protect the Saionji family since long ago. Until now, Kimihito Saionji and Takeru Ichinose have been glued at the hip as master and servant. Kimihito's haughty personality is an eyesore to his classmates. Still, as a master, he has to put on airs, no matter how much he wants to openly admire Takeru's coolness as well.
On the other hand, Takeru doesn't mind being ordered around at all. In truth, his master is quite naive and helpless without a servant—and Takeru fully intends to keep it that way. He can abide by whatever command if it means having this unique side of Kimihito all to himself.

name: Because I Like Your Eyes
nutshell: A guy called Hitomi likes eyes way too much. Things then escalate.

name: Banzai! -Manzai-
nutshell:
大阪育ちで、幼い頃から漫才師になることを夢見ていた哲夫は、有名漫才師に弟子入りするもクビになり、今は借金取りに追われる日々…。その現実から逃げるため、哲夫は天井から吊るしたヒモに手をかけて首を── …その時、テレビから流れてきたのは、幼馴染で元相方の、いっせーの漫才だった。いっせーとまた漫才をしたい! という気持ちに突き動かされ、走り出す哲夫だが…!?
KUJIRAが描く、昭和青春漫才ラプソディー、開幕!

name: Reincarnated War God
tags: Reincarnation,Time Travel,Action,Long Strip,Martial Arts,Adventure,Drama,Horror,Fantasy,Web Comic,Supernatural,Adaptation,Full Color
nutshell:
In order to reverse the defeat that lasted for more than forty years, the god of war Chen Yun was reborn and returned to 10 years before the start of the war to see how he dominated the martial arts as the second son of the Simon family, Simon Fei!


Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>




Official Simplified Chinese Translation


Official Japanese Translation

name: Hello, Mr. Blue
nutshell:
"She who is afraid of water, what kind of love song will she compose when she meets him who is wandering in the sea?" One day, Areum received a phone call saying that she had a younger brother who was adopted to France? That man is also a world-renowned diving expert! What exactly is going on?
This is a story about a woman who is afraid of the water and a man that prefers being underwater by the same artist who drew "Honey Honey Wedding".

name: Tracker of Dawn
nutshell:
Chryserua, a twilight dragon, loved in the new realm. She accidentally spends one night with three men and erases their memories to cover up the mistake.
One of them is a childhood friend who she hasn't seen in a long time. One is a rough fairy who have been ignoring each other for a long time. One is a fellow researcher?


Original Webtoon <Lezhin>

name: Hikari to Yami no Logic
nutshell: Sakura Kazuki is a telepath who can sense negative emotions such as malice through contact. Despite his cute 17-year-old appearance, he’s in fact a 26-year-old rookie detective in the police force, Division One. Teamed with his seasoned, assertive partner/mentor, Shido-san, Sakura often works undercover. His disguises consist of a high school boy, an office lady, and he even gets to wear a cat suit!? Cosplay (costume play) in the police force!?
